name: Escape It! [Web Version]
description:
Try out this obstacle game, named 'Escape It!". It's a nice game to relieve your stress (or to create more stress?).  Now as a HTML game.

I challenge you to beat all the five levels in the game, find out if you're the 'warrior' or not!

Hope you like my game. Game made with ❤️by Realinspirer.
